name: Evolve Media Holdings
goal:
Evolve Media Holdings has as main goal to provide strategic communication solutions to businesses in general and startups in particular. Within these framework, we have a business magazine targeting the above audience- Evolve Magazine which can be found here: www.evolvemag.co
a web TV platform which can be accessed at www.evolvewebtv.com and we have an event series- Building entrepreneurial ecosystems in Africa- BEEA with an annual event to make the evaluation of our men project for the African continent developed in many phases under the same name and can be accessed at https://beea.africa

In addition to the above, we act as a link between companies with specific interest in expanding to Africa as well as companies and startups looking to expand to Europe, investors and other institutions by providing them with on the ground information to enable them take better decisions.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: We are currently following up the Building entrepreneurial ecosystems in Africa project, which is a holistic project designed in four faces to cover the entire entrepreneurship, investment and startup ecosystem in Africa starting from lobbying for educational policies that uphold the introduction of entrepreneurship education in schools, through the startup phase to the investment phase and communication phase (visibility and brand management)
